text: phwk khea klaw wa mha brisuththi phraxngkh than mi penkar bangkhwr kæ phwk rea thi phwk rea ca yudthux phu khumkhrxng xun «nxkcak phraxngkh tæthwa phraxngkh di thrng prathan paccay hı kæ phwk khea læa brrphburusʹ khxng phwk khea cnkrathang phwk khea di lum tx kar raluk læa phwk khea di pen hmu chn thi wibati
